smarterAppMetadata.Subject: ELA
smarterAppMetadata.SufficientEvidenceOfClaim: 2. (Elaboration) The student will use information provided in a stimulus to write well-developed informational/explanatory text by applying elaboration techniques such as a. Developing and elaborating the focus (main idea) using supporting evidence
smarterAppMetadata.EvidenceStatement: 2. (Elaboration) The student will use information provided in a stimulus to write well-developed informational/explanatory text by applying elaboration techniques such as a. Developing and elaborating the focus (main idea) using supporting evidence
